transArray.content: Hello dear guest! Thank you. First of all, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. We apologize for not being able to give you a satisfactory stay experience. We hope that we will make it clear to you at your convenience if we did not work properly during your stay at the hotel. At the same time, we will also carry out internal self-examination and make rectifications if any deficiencies are found. All hotel staff also hope that you can give us a chance to correct our mistakes and notice our progress when you check in again. I wish you all the best!
